mapper.sql: SELECT qaNo, title, content, regDate, memberId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA ( MEMBERID, TITLE, CONTENT ) VALUES (#{ memberId }, #{ title }, #{ content })
mapper.select: SELECT QANO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, MEMBERID FROM QA WHERE DELETED = '0' ORDER BY QANO DESC

SELECT Q.QANO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.REGDATE, Q.MEMBERID, A.COMMENTNO, A.CONTENT, A.REGDATE, A.MEMBERID FROM QA Q LEFT OUTER JOIN QACOMMENT A ON Q.QANO = A.QANO WHERE Q.QANO = #{ qaNo } AND Q.DELETED = '0' ORDER BY Q.QANO DESC
